data.title: Paessler PRTG Network Monitor Product Overview by E-SPIN
data.meta_description: Paessler PRTG Network Monitor Product Overview by E-SPIN that will give you more information regarding this product that you are required.
data.text:
PRTG Monitors Every Aspect Of Your IT Infrastructure

PRTG monitors all systems, devices, traffic and applications of your IT infrastructure using these technologies:

SNMP: ready to use and custom options

WMI and Windows Performance Counters

SSH: for Linux/Unix and MacOS systems

Flows and Packet Sniffing

HTTP requests

Any REST API returning XML or JSON Ping, SQL and many more

NETWORK MONITORING

Monitor every aspect of your network, PINGs, traffic, bandwidth and much more at a glance – PRTG alerts you even before errors occur.

BANDWIDTH MONITORING

Promptly identify potential bandwidth capacity and overloads. Identify shortages and get alerted before problems occur.

HARDWARE MONITORING

Monitor your entire hardware at a glance – Computer, Printer, Servers, Hard Drives, Router, Switches, RAM and all other devices.

SNMP MONITORING

Monitor everything in your network via SNMP. Keep an eye on applications & servers using bandwidth, avoid bottlenecks & downtimes

IP MONITORING

PRTG’s Auto Discovery Tool identifies and monitors all IP addresses in your network, even remote and on Virtual Machines.

DATABASE MONITORING

Monitor every aspect of your databases: availability, downtimes, usage, alerts. Oracle SQL, MS SQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and more.

APPLICATION MONITORING

Monitor SQL, Exchange & server software, cloud and virtualized applications and nearly every standard application with PRTG.

PING MONITORING

Check the availability of ALL network devices and get a quick an flexible overview and alerts in real-time.

LAN MONITORING

PRTG keeps an eye on all pillars of your LAN. Workstations, Router, Switches, Servers and your Bandwidth – Monitored ‘All In One’.

WIFI MONITORING

Monitor your wireless network with PRTG – device status, load, traffic, signal strength, last access, every aspect at a glance.

NETFLOW MONITORING

NetFlow lets you analyze your bandwidth and determine i.e. the amount of traffic caused by IP addresses, protocols, or programs.

PORT MONITORING

Monitor open and closed ports, bandwidth, traffic, connections, different protocols and more at a glance.

The below recorded video from a session is about Paessler PRTG Network Monitor Product Overview by E-SPIN that will give you more information regarding this product.

For those who can not join us for the end user and channel partner product seminar session, please see the summary and highlight clip for the event.
